properties.name: api.security.token.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: api.security.token.expiration-hours
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in hours.

properties.name: api.security.token.issuer
properties.description: Issuer's name of the JWT token.

properties.name: api.security.token.zone-offset
properties.description: The time zone reference to use to calculate the expiration time.
